1.content:
"I can't believe we finally found it, the historical Mongolian Mansion" Lurena giggled excitedly, "I know this place is gigantic" Valerie remarked. "What did the books say about this place"? Rachel asked, "They said that this mansion was built back in the early 1800's when supposedly supernatural creatures wandered this area" Natalie replied. "It gives me chills just looking at it, lets go exploring guys" Lurena said, the four friends walked up to the big doors of the mansion and knocked using the old fashioned door knocker shaped like a lions head. It was silent for a few seconds then a trap door opened up from below them and they all fell down into these tubes, the tubes led them down to the bottom floor of the mansion. Lurena and Natalie appeared in a room lit with lots of candlesticks up on the walls and a door directly in front of them. Valerie and Rachel landed in a room filled with old fashioned dolls that were probably made in the 1800's as well, the creepy doll faces were all placed so that they were facing Natalie in the center of the room, there was one door in front of them as well. Once all the girls got their composure they heard a voice over a speaker "Hello and welcome to the Mongolian Mansion, if you are here that means you are either travelers passing through looking to find help or you are trying to find out more about this historical mansion, well I am sorry to say that you have made a grave mistake coming here for you see this mansion is haunted by different supernatural creatures that used to wander around these parts back in the 1800's and they love to hear laughter. Don't worry though for there is a way for you all to escape but in order to do so you must make your way to the top floor of this 5 story mansion and switch off the mansions security because the doors on the 2 floor entrance where you all fell from are locked, you might be thinking well that doesn't sound to hard but unfortunately for you their are a lot of different paths in this mansion, you could say its like one big maze, and top it off all the creatures in this mansion will be hunting you for your laughter. How they will acquire it is something you will find out soon enough. I wish you all the best of luck" the speaker shut off.

Whose Story would you like to follow?
1.title: The Mongolian Mansion

11.content: "Woah, look at this place Natalie" Lurena said with awe in her voice, "Its kinda creepy but I like it" Natalie replied, "okay so we need to meet up with Valerie and Rose at the top of the mansion and turn off the security so we can get out of here" Lurena said earnestly. "Yeah but I don't see why we can't still do some exploring while we are at it" Natalie replied, "true but we have to be careful you heard what he said about the supernatural creatures" Lurena exclaimed. Natalie nodded and said "Looks like there are three doors Lurena, one has a coffin, one has a moon, and the last one has two people on it, which one should we enter"?

111.content:
Lurena went straight for the door with the coffin symbol. She loved the Twilight books and movies and felt that she could cope with that environment easily. "Look Nat", she said, "maybe we can find traces of the ancestors of Edward or Jacob." Her younger friend nodded eagerly and went along.

Any hope of a quiet entry was spoiled by the loud, high pitched sound the door made when they pushed it open. To the girl's muted disappointment the narrow steps went down, further away from the fifth floor they were looking to get to finally. The steps were humid and illuminated by live torches. Towards the bottom of the stairs there were no more torches. "Let's take one of them each" Lurena said and pulled the wooden handle of the torch from its fixing.

At the end of the stairs there was a small room with three further heavy doors which had large keys sticking in the keyholes. Next to the doors there were symbols carved in old oak. Natalie went closer and identified them as two dancing girls (girl's room), fighting boys (boy's room) and a man and a woman in intimate contact (adult room).

Which room did they choose?

Girls
Boys
Adults

"I ain't going back we should press forward" Natalie argued. Lurena nodded and the 2 girls made their way to the new door, it was just a big black door, no pictures or symbols on it. info.brief_description: Join 4 friends as they journey into the mysterious Mongolian Mansion
info.description:
Join the 4 friends Lurena (16 year old Girl), Natalie (13 year old Girl), Valerie(15 year old Girl), and Rachel (14 year old Girl) as they explore the strange Mongolian Mansion that they had heard about from some of the history books they have read. Their curiosity may have gotten the best of them as they don't know what lies in store for them inside this gigantic Mansion where anything could happen. These supernatural beings inside this Mansion enjoy tickling curious travelers that come inside their mansion looking for adventure.

Lurena and Natalie are the 2 girls that have a yearning for anything historical and so they are willing to go against all threats of danger to discover new things. Valerie and Rachel are there 2 girl friends that accompany Lurena and Natalie on their escapades for fun and adventure even though they are more concerned with being safe than uncovering history.

Here is a link if you need some ideas for supernatural creatures to use in the story --- http://mysticinvestigations.com/supernatural-beings/

Rules:
1. Any kind of Supernatural being is fair game (Vampire, Werewolf, Zombie, Ghost, etc)
2. No Killing off characters
3. Nudity is allowed
4. Any kind of Tickling scenario is allowed
5. Erotic situations are allowed as well but keep it at a minimum, this is mostly just a tickling story
